sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>It is used to kick start Subscription Summarization</description>
        <name>AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker = Class.create();


AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	start: function() {
		
		if (!this.canProceed())
			return;
		
		var summarizer = new SNC.SubscriptionSummarizer();
		summarizer.runSummary();
		
		var progressId = summarizer.getProgressWorkerId();
		
		gs.log("AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker: getProgressID = " + progressId);
		
		return progressId;
	},
	
	canProceed: function(){
	
		if (gs.hasRole("admin") || gs.hasRole("usage_admin"))
			return true;
		
		return false;
	}
});

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>neha.dube@snc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-05 06:58:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>56b056641b885010593876a61a4bcbf9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXSubscriptionSummaryWorker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Administration Base" source="com.snc.usage_admin.base">e823c9cf6d6620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_56b056641b885010593876a61a4bcbf9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-07 21:43:23</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>577</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
